articles.title: Microsoft Bing Head to Step Down Amid AI Push - PYMNTS.com
articles.description: The head of Microsoft's Bing search engine and ad business, Mikhail Parakhin, is reportedly leaving that role.
articles.content:
The head of Microsoft’sBing search engine and ad business is reportedly leaving that role.
Mikhail Parakhin’s departure the subject of a Monday (March 25) Bloomberg News report comes a week after th… [+2503 chars]
